channel.title: Using a Project Insaity source and it's unstable
channel.description:
well the subject says it all basically i'll leave it on my vps and trhen a few hours later the run.cmd is still up it says error connecting to server and i loose player because people cant connect the cmd shows errors and heres some errors it shows
[5/7/11 4:59 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 [5/7/11 4:59 PM]: at server.model.items.ItemAssistant.bankItem(ItemAssista nt.java:1639) [5/7/11 4:59 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.ClickingButtons.processP acket(ClickingButtons.java:34) [5/7/11 4:59 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [5/7/11 4:59 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1236) [5/7/11 4:59 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:153) [5/7/11 4:59 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:164)
and i'll post more if i get another one after dc
EDIT-----------------------------
i got this error and server dc'ed so how would i deal with this
[5/7/11 8:46 PM]: at server.event.EventContainer.execute(EventContainer.ja va:51) [5/7/11 8:46 PM]: at server.event.EventManager.run(EventManager.java:101) [5/7/11 8:46 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [5/7/11 8:46 PM]: java.lang.NullPointerException [5/7/11 8:46 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant$3.execute(Combat Assistant.java:4935)

item.source: Using a Project Insaity source and it's unstable

item.title: Using a Project Insaity source and it's unstable
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

www.sagi-x.com:

Hmm, Well with my one before i had problems with it so i just did that for easiness lol.

Okay, so what happens if someone tries to deposit some coins? They’re going to be pretty unhappy since the item id for coins is 995, and you’re only going up to 100. HOPEFULLY there is some input validation in the bank class…

Read full topic

item.source: Using a Project Insaity source and it's unstable

item.title: Using a Project Insaity source and it's unstable
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Meeper98:

Im sure, you’re a great coder, (im also snickering sarcastically) but the person who made this topic already messaged me about what he needed and i already helped him, he got his help and his server’s running properly, the problem was that he had his server running for to long. Don’t worry about it and if i’m wrong, then you’re terribly off.

You are wrong. The error obviously says that someone tried to bank an item, and the Item[] probably didn’t have enough free spaces so it threw an error.

www.sagi-x.com:

Hmm, how?

Well first of all, your code doesn’t do a thing. All it does is deposit 2,147,000,000 of the first 100 items into their bank.

Read full topic

item.title: Using a Project Insaity source and it's unstable
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“www.sagi-x.com, post:5, topic:394154”]No, no. No, no. It’s probably your bank inventory button. If you have one. Any way, you could replace yours with mine… case 89217: //Deposit Inventory for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000); break;[/quote]

Except that anyone can easily dupe with this.

Read full topic

Any way, you could replace yours with mine… case 89217: //Deposit Inventory for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 101; itemID++) for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000); break;

item.title: Using a Project Insaity source and it's unstable
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

aight well i got a pretty good auto restarter that is detects when ur server crashes, and has a certain time when you want it to restart ill give you link if i can find it hold on x)

Edit: http://up.ht/leuwRN is the url, all you need to do is in the txt file rename the location from my destination to yours good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Using a Project Insaity source and it's unstable
item.dc:creator: @Meeper98 Meeper98
item.description:
@Meeper98 wrote:

It probably means your server has just been runing to long, i suggest (in my own opinion because i do not know how to fix this) that you use an auto restarter and set it to a certain time such as an hour. best of luck

Read full topic
